query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_messages (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  conversationId INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant', 'system', 'tool') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  model VARCHAR(100),
  audioUrl TEXT,
  imageUrl TEXT,
  thinkingProcess JSON,
  toolCalls JSON,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (conversationId) REFERENCES ai_conversations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3rf55phMSy1Bqm7.root --database XQpiGbEcueWdnyaoEtKtzk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_messages (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  conversationId INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant', 'system', 'tool') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  model VARCHAR(100),
  audioUrl TEXT,
  imageUrl TEXT,
  thinkingProcess JSON,
  toolCalls JSON,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (conversationId) REFERENCES ai_conversations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
